MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Crewe Road, Sandy Lane, Park Lane and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead power line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:15AM on 15th October 2020
